attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is truly horrifying, I can’t imagine what people were thinking when they made it. It’s hurting me just being on my phone and I’m deleting immediately. If I could give 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: Pay for my therapy!!!!
attributes.review: I kept seeing a lot of photos of offensive disgusting images and campaigns. Please ban this app. I have been traumatized since the day I downloaded it. When scrolling on this app my eyes when from 👁👄👁 to ➖👄➖.

attributes.title: This is sad.
attributes.review: I was honestly sad to see I couldn’t leave a half star. This app is sadder than when I got left at the altar. All the singles ladies here are running. I thought this app was going to help me move to Canada for 2020! But I guess I got the wrong one.

attributes.title: absolutely awful
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to keep up with current events and whatnot. but when i opened it, i remembered that the man on the face of the app is a racist, sexist, LGBTQ+phobic, ugly, (the list goes on) predator and child trafficker/abuser. never downloading again, how embarrassing! 😳

attributes.title: Scary!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and that night I saw a creepy man in the corner. His hair looked like spaghetti and his skin like a Cheeto. He had on a disgusting suit with a red tie. and then he started talking, his first words were “TrUmP 2020”. I screamed at those words and the minute my mother came in, he was gone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: Just Why?
attributes.review: sorry but this app brought literal tears to my eyes. 🧚🏼‍♀️✨. it reminds me of school while sitting in a room filled with ignorant smelly teenage boys because it also makes me want to barf, run away and brought me into depression just like this app. this should be illegal it is so foul 🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Ewwwww
attributes.review: This app is absolutely disgusting the first thing you see is “make America great again” when it was never really great well besides the time Obama was president but any way I just want to know why is a Cheeto puff the president like y’all down graded so bad.🤦‍♀️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: Literally this app is so slow 😾😾 I opened it and it took over FIVE HOURS TO EVEN LOUD. Secondly this app steals your information which is a big no no. It will send your personal information to companies without your consent which is never good. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT COULD PUT YOU OR YOUR FAMILY IN DANGER.

attributes.title: no
attributes.review:
I swear this dude made it so hard to eat... I just tried to eat oranges but now I no longer can. Oranges, my baby. My sweet sweet cat. I am so sorry I cannot finish you, you and the president looks to similar alike 😿😿

Chill I don’t have a cat named oranges

At least not anymore

attributes.title: No ✨💕
attributes.review: Terrible, disgusting, ugly, baffling, bewildering, flabbergasting, dreadful, awful, horrific, appalling, horrible, terrifying, nasty, unpleasant, horrifying, horrendous, foul, revolting, ghastly, obnoxious, repulsive, hateful, racist, homophobic, discriminatory, offensive, vile, hurtful, abhorrent, loathsome, frightful, god awful, hellish, satanic, inferior, atrocious, gross, harmful, hideous, inadequate, lousy, nasty, shameful, shocking, unacceptable excuse of an app/campaign.
